This 16-week randomize control study examine incremental effect follow 3 intervention group insulin sensitivity , insulin secretion , adiposity , habitual ad libitum physical activity : - Control group ( delay circuit training intervention ; n=15 ) - Circuit training group ( strength + aerobic training ; 2 time per week ; n=15 ) - Circuit training ( ) + weekly motivational interviewing session ( n=15 ) Specific Aim 1 : To examine effect 16-week circuit training program adiposity , insulin dynamic , associate hormone adipocytokines , cardiorespiratory fitness , muscular strength overweight Latina adolescent girl . Hypothesis 1 : Participation circuit-training program result significant improvement physiological metabolic outcome , include : ) body composition measure DEXA , b ) fat distribution measure MRI , c ) adipose tissue hormone ( e.g . leptin , adiponectin , TNF-α ) measure fast blood sample , ) insulin sensitivity secretion measure frequently sample intravenous tolerance test , e ) aerobic fitness measure single stage submaximal treadmill test , f ) increase muscular strength measure repetition maximum . Specific Aim 2 : To examine incremental effect add motivational interviewing session circuit train self-selected ad libitum physical activity 5-hour observational period , habitual physical activity level use 7 day accelerometry , meaning motivation exercise use questionnaire intervention . Hypothesis 2 : The addition motivational interviewing encourage empower participant active outside intervention foster healthy physical activity behavior daily life .
